comments:
With latest dev build I got this error when activating task from bug 149607 (with no context attached)

-- Error Log --

Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.ui
Stack Trace:

Looks like the memento was not correctly written, perhaps due to the workbench getting killed.  We are now robust to this.  

I also fixed a bug where only one set of context editors was being remembered, so will make a dev build today or tomorrow to get that out.
